title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 7
itunes:title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 7
description:
On this episode: The hosts discuss their dinner together in NYC (:46); If they are OK with the Giants players heading to Miami on their off day (3:12); The coaching carousel (15:14); Nate talks about the player’s perspective of head coach getting fired (17:28); Peter discusses the hiring practices NFL teams (21:49); Kyle & Nate recall players’ relationships with a coach and the emotional investment involved (28:00); The team breaks down the matchups on Wild Card Weekend (35:21) and to close, Kay tells this week’s “Blind Item” Story (44:23)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
